attributes.action: create a new law for there to be an automatic general election if senior officials of the governing party break the law for the financial benefit of their party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has argued that "broader change within our system of political funding" is necessary for it to be more transparent and honest. This will not happen without significant and real incentives for parties to ensure they adhere to electoral law. It is time that more effective, tougher sanctions were in place against those who are prepared to breach the law in the financial self-interest of their party.
